name: Pieces of Time (Chase of Bass)
description:
Left arrow or "A" =  spin left gear
RIght arrow or "D" = spin right gear
Up arrow or "W" = wind clock hands

This game is super early in development so there are some parts that are buggy at the moment or broken and removed momentarily such as the store/customization was game breaking so pulled it temporarily!

Art, music, programming by Chase of Bass made using GMS 2, pyxel edit, nano studio and fl studio for mini game jam
